name: Forklift Truck - Railway Store
description:
Railway station isn't only trains and timetables, it is also handling operations. With Forklift Truck: Railway Store you have a great chance to work with the forklift machine on the large railway station!

Control a high-duty loader machine;
Work at the railway station;
Use a forklift to sort luggage;
Be careful and don't break anything.

Forklift Truck: Railway Store app key Features:

Opportunity to work with a heavy loader;
Large railway station for practicing;
High-quality detailed 3D graphics;
Fascinating sorting luggage job.

Be a loader machine worker with Forklift Truck: Railway Store app!
